awd_titl_txt: CISE Research Instrumentation:  Equipment for Research      in Special Purpose VLSI Architecture
awd_abstract_narration: A system incorporating very large storage capacity and high                computational power will be developed for this project involving                special purpose VLSI applications.  These applications include:                                                                                                 *  VLSI architectures for compression algorithms.                                                                                                               *  VLSI Algorithms for computer vision.                                                                                                                         *  VLSI Algorithms for signal processing.                                                                                                                       *  High level synthesis tools for VLSI.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
